sentences.en: An overlay of wood covers the brick wall.
sentences.cn: 砖墙上覆盖了一层木板.

sentences.en: An overlay snow - white glass vase with flowers design , Qing Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 清乾隆雪地套玻璃花卉盖瓶.

sentences.en: Can join exterior signal and overlay arrives on output signal.
sentences.cn: 可以将外部信号连接并叠加到输出信号上.

sentences.en: In 1969 a ( 51 mm ) bituminous concrete overlay was placed on the concrete deck.
sentences.cn: 1969年在混凝土板上铺设了51mm厚的沥青混凝土铺装层.

sentences.en: In parallel or concordant bedding the strata overlay each other like pages of a book.
sentences.cn: 在平行的或者整合的层面中,地层好象书页一般互相重迭.

sentences.en: Make the poles of acacia and overlay them with gold.
sentences.cn: 要用皂荚木作杠,用金包裹.

sentences.en: Overlay it with gold and make a gold molding around it.
sentences.cn: 你要用皂荚木做几根柜杠,并要用金包裹起来.

sentences.en: Select the red head shape and choose Overlay in the Transparency Palette.
sentences.cn: 选择红色的头部形状,并选择在重叠的透明度,调色盘.

sentences.en: Show the top overlay and select Browse Guide from the navigation menu.
sentences.cn: 资料显示最常见覆盖,并选择浏览指南从导航菜单中.

sentences.en: Silver overlay is bonded to the entire surface.
sentences.cn: 整个表面都镀了一层银。

sentences.en: Spatial overlay is an important model of spatial analysis in GIS.
sentences.cn: 空间叠加模型是地理信息系统(GIS)中重要的空间分析模型.

sentences.en: Than set the shape to Opacity 7 % and Overlay.
sentences.cn: 超过规定的形状,以不透明7%和覆盖.

sentences.en: the brass fire surround with its decorative overlay
sentences.cn: 带有装饰覆盖物的铜质壁炉围饰

sentences.en: The roar of the engines was overlaid by a loud banging.
sentences.cn: 引擎的轰鸣被巨大的砰砰声盖过了。

sentences.en: There can be an emotional overlay to the frustration of solving real problems.
sentences.cn: 在真正的问题难以解决而感到沮丧的时候，可能会用其他情感来掩饰。

sentences.en: To cover, mark, or overlay with or as if with flakes.
sentences.cn: 用或似薄片般覆盖 、 标记或延伸.

sentences.en: Various overlay mediums , such as agar , starchgel, methyl cellulose and tragacanth are used.
sentences.cn: 常用的覆盖培养基有:琼脂 、 淀粉凝胶甲基纤维素和黄蓍胶等.

words.tran_cn: 上覆盖，叠加（overlie的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: to cover or be on top of something
